descriptionHtml:
----------------
Lydia Plus (ver p1.5 for Patch 1.5)
----------------

Change the setting of Lydia.

1. Lydia was made into non-death.  (Essential : ON)

2. You can marry Lydia. (PotentiaMarriageFaction Rank : 0)

   [color=yellow]About Marriage Bugs : Skyrim Wiki - http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Marriage[/color]

3. Lydia can do spare clothing freely.  (Default Outfit : NONE, Steel outfit was moved to Iventory.)

4. The action of Lydia was changed. (Opposite Gender Anims : OFF)

5. Lydia can have the weight of luggage will increase 5000 . (Ability : Powerful Lydia 5000)



[color=green]There are many other similar MOD .
Please use it according to your environment. [/color]


[color=red]Please be sure to back up your save data .[/color]


---
Author : hdela


---
This mod was built with Skyrim US Ver 1.4.27.0 and Ver 1.5.24.0


---
Installation : Unzip the file, and overwrite Skyrim Data folder. Or drop the esp into your Skyrim Data directory.


----------------------
[color=lightblue]for Skyrim US Ver 1.5.24.0[/color]
----------------------

p1.5 : 

for Skyrim Patch 1.5 (base MOD ver 1.1)
Please use If a previous version does not work.
Please overwrite or exchange.

Master file : Skyrim.esm, Update.esm


----------------------
[color=lightblue]for Skyrim US Ver 1.4.27.0[/color]
----------------------

v1.1 : 

Please overwrite. 
Lydia can have the weight of luggage will increase 5000 . 
But, balance of the game will be broken .


v1.0 : First MOD

>Found 2 sets of steel armor.

Default Armor is already registered into the save file. 
In that case, the armor obtained by MOD will also be added. 

>She becomes nakedness. 

Since Default Outfit is set as NONE, her fundamental clothes are \"nakedness.\" 


---
Enjoy!

by hdela
author: hdela

files.name: Lydia Plus v1-1
